title: Google to curtail cross-app tracking on Android phones
text:
Google's plans for Android could hasten an end to more than a decade of advertising practices across smartphones in which companies including Meta Platforms Inc.'s FB Facebook layered their code into hundreds of thousands of apps to track consumer behavior.

Apple's changes, which went into effect last year, have already upended the digital-ad industry and contributed to a wipeout of more than $300 billion from Meta's market value.

Google GOOG said Wednesday that it plans to develop more privacy-focused replacements for the alphanumeric identifiers associated with individual smartphones that some apps use to gather and share information about users.
